link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: "Total amount of deposits received' = "Money received by issue of non-convertible, optionally convertible debentures/bonds" "Deposits received from Shareholders" + "Deposits received from Directors" + "Deposits received from Companies" "Deposits received from Others - including deposits received from public"
"Minimum investment required to be maintained under unencumbered approved securities" must be 10% of the deposits shown against "(c) Total (1+2) (total Public Deposits)"
"Percentage of amount actually maintained to total public deposits under unencumbered approved securities" = ("Amount actually maintained")*100/ ("Total public deposits")

"Minimum investment required to be maintained under Fixed deposits/ certificate of deposits of scheduled commercial banks or public financial institutions" must be 10% of the deposits shown against "(c) Total (1+2) (total Public Deposits)"

"Percentage of amount actually maintained to total public deposits under Fixed deposits/ certificate of deposits of scheduled commercial banks or public financial institutions" = ("Amount actually maintained") * 100 / ("Total public deposits")

"Minimum investment required to be maintained under Bonds or debentures or commercial papers of a Govt. company/ public sector bank/ public financial institution/ corporations" must be 75% of the deposits shown against "(c) Total (1+2) (total Public Deposits)"

"Percentage of amount actually maintained to total public deposits under bonds or debentures or commercial papers of a Govt. company/ public sector bank/ public financial institution/ corporations" = ("Amount actually maintained") * 100/ ("Total public deposits")
"Maximum investment required to be maintained under Schemes of UTI/other Mutual Funds" should be 10% of the deposits shown against "(c) Total (1+2) (total Public Deposits)"
"Percentage of amount actually maintained to total public deposits under schemes of UTI/other Mutual Funds" = ("Amount actually maintained")* 100/ ("total public deposits multiply")
"Amount actually maintained under Schemes of UTI/other Mutual Funds" = "Unit Trust Of India" + "Other Mutual Funds"

"Maximum investment required to be maintained under investments in bonds or debentures or commercial papers of companies incorporated under the Companies Act,1956" should be 10% of the deposits shown against "(c) Total (1+2) (total Public Deposits)"

"Percentage of amount actually maintained to total public deposits under bonds or debentures or commercial papers of companies incorporated under the Companies Act,1956" = ("Amount actually maintained") * 100 / ("Total public deposits")

"Amount of Investments required to be maintained under other investments as approved by the company's Board of Directors" should be equal to 20% of deposits shown against (c) Total (1+2) (total Public Deposits) or 10% of NOF whichever is higher

"Amount of Investments actually maintained under other investments as approved by the company's Board of Directors" should be equal to 20% of deposits shown against (c) Total (1+2) (total Public Deposits) or 10 times of NOF whichever is less

Validation not satisfied [Percentage of amount actually maintained to total public deposits under other investments as approved by the company's board of directors" = ("Amount actually maintained")*100 / ("Total public deposits")

"Total of amount actually maintained" = "Amount actually maintained under Unencumbered approved securities" + "Amount actually maintained under Fixed deposits/ certificate of deposits of scheduled commercial banks or public financial institutions" + "Amount actually maintained under Bonds or debentures or commercial papers of a Govt. company/ public sector bank/ public financial institution/ corporations"

"Total number of certificates outstanding" = "Certificates outstanding for Secured non-convertible and optionally convertible debentures/bonds" + "certificates outstanding for Unsecured non-convertible and optionally convertible debentures/bonds" + "Deposits received from shareholder" + "Deposits received from other"

"Total number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Upto 5,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 5,001-10,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 10,001-15,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 15,001-25,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 25,001- 50,000"+ "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 50,000"

"Total amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Upto 5,000" +" Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 5,001-10,000" + "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 10,001-15,000" + " Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 15,001-25,000" + " Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 25,001- 50,000" + " Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 50,000", Since "number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" will not be part of error message.

"Total number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Upto 5 years" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 5 years and upto 7 years" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 7 years"

"Total amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Upto 5 years" + "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 5 years and upto 7 years" "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 7 years"

"Total number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" under table “Period - wise details of deposits” = number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Upto 5,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 5,001-10,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 10,001-15,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 15,001-25,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 25,001- 50,000" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 50,000"

"Total amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Upto 5,000" +" Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 5,001-10,000" + "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 10,001-15,000" + " Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 15,001-25,000" + " Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold 25,001- 50,000" + " Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 50,000", Since "number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" will not be part of error message.

"Total number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Upto 5 years" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 5 years and upto 7 years" + "Number of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 7 years"

"Total amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold" under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Upto 5 years" + "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 5 years and upto 7 years" "Amount of deposits accepted/ certificates sold Above 7 years"

"Total number of deposits accepted/ certificates" sold under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Deposits accepted/ Certificates sold before 15.5.1987" + "Deposits accepted/ Certificates sold on and from 15.5.1987 to 11.4.1993" + "Deposits accepted/ Certificates sold on or after 12.4.1993"

"Total Amout of deposits accepted/ certificates" sold under table Period - wise details of deposits = "Deposits accepted/ Certificates sold before 15.5.1987" + "Deposits accepted/ Certificates sold on and from 15.5.1987 to 11.4.1993" + "Deposits accepted/ Certificates sold on or after 12.4.1993"

"Total amount of deposits accepted" under table Interest-rate wise details of deposits = "Amount of deposits accepted Upto 5,000" + "Amount of deposits accepted 5,001-10,000" + "Amount of deposits accepted 10,001-15,000" + "Amount of deposits accepted 15,001-25,000" + "Amount of deposits accepted 25,001- 50,000" + "Amount of deposits accepted Above 50,000"

"Total amount of deposits accepted" under table Interest-rate wise details of deposits = "Amount of deposits accepted Upto 5 years" + "Amount of deposits accepted Above 5 years and upto 7 years" + "Amount of deposits accepted Above 7 years"

"Total amount of deposits" accepted under table Interest-rate wise details of deposits = "Amount of deposits accepted whose Rate of Interest 4%" + "Amount of deposits accepted whose Rate of Interest 6% (i.e. accepted prior to 30th June 2000)" + "Amount of deposits accepted whose Rate of Interest 6% (i.e. accepted after 30th June 2000)" + "Amount of deposits accepted whose Rate of interest 8%" + "Amount of deposits accepted whose Rate of interest 10%" + "Amount of deposits accepted whose Rate of interest above 10%"

"Total Number of Accounts exempted borrowings" = "Borrowings from banks and other specified financial institutions" + "Money received from employees of the company by way of security deposits" + "Money received by way of security or advance from purchasing, selling or other agents in the course of company's business or advance received against orders for supply of goods or properties or for rendering of services" + "Money received by issue of convertible debentures/ bonds" + "Money received by way of subscription to any shares or convertible debentures/bonds pending allotment or money received by way of Calls in advance on shares in accordance with the Articles of Association so long as such amount is not repayable to the shareholders under the Articles of Association of the company"

"Total amount of exempted borrowings" = "Borrowings from banks and other specified financial institutions" + "Money received from employees of the company by way of security deposits" + "Money received by way of security or advance from purchasing, selling or other agents in the course of company's business or advance received against orders for supply of goods or properties or for rendering of services" + "Money received by issue of convertible debentures/ bonds" + "Money received by way of subscription to any shares or convertible debentures/bonds pending allotment or money received by way of Calls in advance on shares in accordance with the Articles of Association so long as such amount is not repayable to the shareholders under the Articles of Association of the company"
"Total Capital Funds" = "Paid-up Equity Capital" + "Free Reserves"
"Total Deductions to capital fund" = "Accumulated balance of loss" + "Balance of deferred revenue expenditure" + "Other intangible assets"
"Owned Fund" = ("Paid-up Equity Capital" + "Free Reserves") - ( "Accumulated balance of loss" + "Balance of deferred revenue expenditure" + "Other intangible assets")

"Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds" = (Book value of investments in shares of "Subsidiaries of the Company" + "Companies in the same group" + "All other Non-Banking Financial Companies") + (Book value of investments in debentures and bonds of "Subsidiaries of the Company" + "Companies in the same group" + "All other Non-Banking Financial Companies") + (Outstanding loans and advances including bills purchased/ discounted, inter-corporate deposits, hire purchase and lease finance made to, and deposits with" + "Subsidiaries of the Company v. Companies in the same group" + "All other Non-Banking Financial Companies")
"Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds" = "Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds" - 10% of "Owned Fund"
"Net Owned Fund" should be calculated by deducting Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds from Owned Fund]
"Total investments in shares of subsidiaries of the company" must be sum of it child elements
"Total investments in shares of companies in the same group" must be sum of it child elements
"Total investments in shares of all other non-banking financial companies" must be sum of it child elements
"Total investments in debentures and bonds of subsidiaries of the company" must be sum of it child elements
"Total investments in debentures and bonds of companies in the same group" must be sum of it child elements
"Total investments in debentures and bonds of all other non-banking financial companies" must be sum of it child elements

"Total Outstanding loans and advances including bills purchased/ discounted, inter-corporate deposits, hire purchase and lease finance made to, and deposits with of subsidiaries of the company" must be sum of it child elements

"Total Outstanding loans and advances including bills purchased/ discounted, inter-corporate deposits, hire purchase and lease finance made to, and deposits with of companies in the same group" must be sum of it child elements

"Total Outstanding loans and advances including bills purchased/ discounted, inter-corporate deposits, hire purchase and lease finance made to, and deposits with of all other non-banking financial companies" must be sum of it child elements
"Total other investment" = "Fixed deposits with banks/certificates of deposits issued by banks" + "Balances in any other deposit accounts with bank" + "Others"

"Total investment" = "Investments in shares of and debentures/bonds and commercial papers issued by companies and contribution to the capital of firms and proprietary concerns where directors of the company hold substantial interest" + "Shares, debentures/bonds and commercial papers of other companies" + "Total other Investments"

"Total Investments in shares of and debentures/bonds & commercial papers issued by companies and contribution to the capital of firms and proprietary concerns where directors of the company hold substantial interest" must be sum of it child elements

"Total other credit exposures" = "Credit exposures pertains to Companies not in the same Group" + "Credit exposures pertains to Directors" + "Credit exposures pertains to Shareholders" + "Credit exposures pertains to Chief Executive Officer and other employees" + "Credit exposures pertains to Purchasing, Selling and other Agents" + "Credit exposures pertains to Depositors" + "Credit exposures pertains to Others"
"Total credit exposures" = "Credit exposures pertains to Companies, firms and proprietary concerns where directors of the company hold substantial interest" + "Credit exposures pertains to Others"]
"Net lease income" = "Gross lease income" - "Depreciation on Assets on Lease/ Lease Equalization"

"[Total fund based income" = "Net lease income" + "Hire purchase income" + "Bills discounting income" + "Investment income from fixed deposits / certificate of deposits" + "Investment income from government / approved securities" + "Dividend / interest on other investments" + "Profit / Loss on sale of shares / debentures / commercial papers" + "Interest income from inter-corporate deposits / loans" + "Interest income from other loans and advances" + "One- time charge from new depositor / subscriber towards cost of expenses for issuing brochure, application form and servicing of the depositor's account"
"[Total fee-based income" = "Income from merchant banking activities" + "Underwriting commission" + "Income from syndication of bills, loans, ICDs, lease & hire purchase" + "Miscellaneous income"
"Total Income" = "Total fund based income" + " Total fee-based income"

"Total financing costs" = "Interest paid on fixed deposits" + "Interest paid on ICDs" + "Brokerage / Agents' Commission" + 'Reimbursement of expenses to brokers / agents" + "Other financing costs" + "Bills rediscounting charges"
"Total operating costs" = "Employee costs" + "Other administrative costs"

"Total expenses" = "Total financing costs" + "Total operating costs" + "Depreciation on own assets" + "Intangible assets amortised" + "Provision for diminution in value of investments" + "Provision against Non-Performing Assets" + "Other Provisions if any"
"Profit before tax" = "Total Income" - "Total expenses"
"Profit after tax" = "Profit before tax" - "Tax"

"Total Overdue" = "Lease overdue more than 12 months" + "Lease overdue up to 12 months" + "Hire purchase overdue more than 12 months" + "Hire purchase overdue up to 12 months" + "Other overdue more than 6 months" + "Other overdue up to 6 months"
"Total amount of public deposit" must be sum of it child elements
"Total amount of approved securities held towards liquid assets requirement" must be sum of it child elements
"Total amount of approved securities held towards liquid assets requirement in scheduled commercial banks" must be sum of it child elements
"Date of Payment" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Date of Auditor signing" must be greater than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Date of opening of branch" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Date of opening of branch/office" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Date of communication to RBI by opened branch/office" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Date of publicity" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Date of closing" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Date of communication to RBI by closed branch/office" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Interest collection dates 1" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"Interest collection dates 2" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"From date" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"
"To date" must be less than or equal to "reporting end date"

"Total amount of deposits Upto 5 years under tabular disclosure Period - wise details of deposits" should match with corresponding "Total amount of deposits upto 5 years under tabular disclosure Interest-rate wise details of deposits"

"Total amount of deposits above 5 years and upto 7 years under tabular disclosure Period - wise details of deposits" should match with corresponding "Total amount of deposits above 5 years and upto 7 years under tabular disclosure Interest-rate wise details of deposits"

"Total amount of deposits above 7 years under tabular disclosure Period - wise details of deposits" should match with corresponding "Total amount of deposits above 7 years under tabular disclosure Interest-rate wise details of deposits"

"Total amount of deposits" in DNBS06PART03 = "Amount of deposits Prior to commencement of the Directions i.e. before May 15, 1987" + "Amount of deposits After the commencement of the Directions i.e. on and from May 15, 1987" in PART6]

"Total amount of deposits under tabular disclosure Particulars of Deposits Outstanding as on the reporting period end date","Total amount of deposits under tabular disclosure Period - wise details of deposits" and "Total amount of deposits under tabular disclosure Interest-rate wise details of deposits" should be matched with each other]
The PAN entered is invalid. Please enter a valid PAN otherwise enter NA.

"Total deposit amount outstanding" = "Certificates outstanding for Secured non-convertible and optionally convertible debentures/bonds" + "certificates outstanding for Unsecured non-convertible and optionally convertible debentures/bonds" + "Deposits received from shareholder" + "Deposits received from other"

Validation not satisfied [If the user chooses ‘YES’ for “4. (a) Whether SLR requirement complied with during the last quarter?”, then next three data row , i.e. ‘(b) If not, whether demand for penal interest was made by RBI?’ ‘ (c)(i) amount’ “(c) (ii) date of payment thereof” should be empty]
"From date" must be less than or equal to "To date"
Reporting of "(c)(i) amount" and "(c) (ii) date of payment thereof" should be empty as user has reported "No" for the field "4.(b) If not, whether demand for penal interest was made by RBI?"
